ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core.sqlite

Class SQLiteHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • ch.unibe.ese.shopnote.core.sqlite.SQLiteHelper

  • public class SQLiteHelper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    All SQL definitions of the database (create statements) can be found in this class It also takes the responsibility to open the database and update it if neccessary
